notification.contentToBeAnonymized: Okuqukethwe kwakho kuzocashwa ngezinsuku eziyi-7 ukuze
notification.communityContentToBeAnonymized: Yonke imininingwane yakho kulumphakathi izocashwa futhi igcinwe ezinsukwini eziyi-7, ngemva kwalokho ngeke ukwazi ukuyisusa noma ukuyiguqula. Bona okuqukethwe kwakho ngezansi.
notification.groupContentToBeAnonymized: Yonke imininingwane yakho kuleli qembu izocashwa futhi igcinwe ezinsukwini eziyi-7, ngemva kwalokho ngeke ukwazi ukuyisusa noma ukuyiguqula. Bona okuqukethwe kwakho ngezansi.

email.possibleFraudFooter: Chofoza isixhumanisi somphakathi esingezansi, ngena njengomphathi bese ukhetha Ukuphathwa kobugebengu kumenyu.
email.possibleFraudSubHeader: Inani lezenzo ezingase zibe ngobugebengu ezinamathuba angu-75% wobugebengu
email.possibleFraudInformation: Uhlelo lwethu oluzenzakalelayo luthole umsebenzi ongase ube ngobugebengu. Ungabheka ngokucophelela nge-interface yomphathi womphakathi. Eminye yale misebenzi ingase ibe nezizathu ezingezona ezobugebengu ngakho qaphela ukuphenya ngokucophelela ngaphambi kokususa okuqukethwe.
email.automaticToxicityDetection: Lokuqukethwe kubekwe uphawu ngokuzenzakalelayo njengokunobuthi kusetshenziswa ama-algorithms e-AI akala ubuthi bokuqukethwe. Ungasusa okuqukethwe uma kudingeka.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionVision: I-algorithm ye-AI ngokuzenzakalelayo ibeke uphawu kumfanekiso obonakalayo ohambisana nalokuqukethwe. Leli algorithm lihlola izithombe zokungcola okungenzeka, udlame, ezokwelapha, nezithombe ezinobulili. Ungasusa okuqukethwe uma kudingeka.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionDisclaimer: Ngezinye izikhathi i-algorithm ye-AI ibala amaphuzu angalunganga, kulokhu ungakhathazeki, awudingi ukuthatha elinye inyathelo futhi ungaziba le imeyili.
email.user_invite_2: Cofa kusixhumanisi noma unamathisele kubha yekheli lesiphequluli ukwamukela isimemo
email.reset_password_2: Uba ungacelanga lokhu, sicela uzibe le imeyili.
email.reset_password_3: Iphasiwedi yakho kayisoze iguquke uze ufinyelele isixhumanisi esingenhla udale esitsha.
